P003634.project_name: Comprehensive Maternal and Child Health Project

project_abstract.cdata: The principal objective of the Comprehensive Maternal and Child Health (MCH) project is to reduce maternal and child morbidity and mortality in the poorest areas of China. This will be achieved by: 1) improving the quality and effectiveness of MCH care at the primary and county levels; 2) increasing equitable access to and utilization of the basic care; and 3) improving MCH management. The project has four main components: basic health care delivery; health worker's training; management improvement; and a national-level component. Under the basic health care delivery component the project will improve services at the village, township, and county referral levels. The health worker's training component will support in-service training of all health workers concerned with MCH care at the village, township, and county levels in basic MCH, clinical care and management skills. The management improvement component will improve management of comprehensive MCH programs at different levels through training, supervisory support and improved management information. The national level component will oversee the overall management and monitoring of the project, carry out interdepartmental and interprovincial coordination, provide technical support to the provinces, prepare and appraise the second phase of this project and disseminate the project experiences to nonproject areas.

P003634.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>综合性妇幼保健项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的主要目标是降低中国最贫困地区妇幼发病率和死亡率。这一目标将通过以下措施实现：（1）提高基本和县级妇幼保健的质量和效果；（2）增加对妇幼保健服务的公平使用；（3）改进妇幼保健管理。本项目设有四个子项目：（1）基本保健服务提供子项目；（2）卫生工作者培训子项目；（3）管理加强子项目；（4）国家级子项目。基本保健服务子项目将改进村、乡和县级转诊服务；卫生工作者培训子项目将支持对村、乡和县级妇幼保健相关卫生工作者进行在职培训，培训内容为基本妇幼保健、临床保健和管理技能；管理加强子项目将通过培训、监督支持和健全的管理信息加强对各级综合妇幼保健项目的管理；国家级子项目将监督本项目的总体管理和监测工作，在各部门和各省之间开展协调，向各省提供技术支持，准备并评估本项目二期工程，向非项目区传播本项目经验。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
